entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Grand Beach

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
